Thank you, Thank you, Thank you!!!
I just needed to have the Halo 2 Soundtrack, it's really good. And the fact that Incubus made 4 of the  songs(well 1 divided into 4 quarters) makes it even better. So THANK YOU!
Hmm, it's weird... Tracker shows 7seeders, but I started this torrent few hours ago and all I got asi 30people stuck on 0.9%... Anyone experiencing the same?

That IS weird. I see plenty of seeds and people with 
different amounts downloaded.
Leave it on for a while longer and see what happens.
It's just 24hours later and everyone moved to from 0.9% to 1%. I've even tried different clients... OK thanks, I'll wait then. :)

Problem solved. It seems that I've got a corrupted torrent file. It works fine only with proper torrent file downloaded from PirateBay. Isohunt and other index sites have the wrong torrent.

Anyway, thanks for help, I'm really looking forward to hear this. Truly gems. Big up! :)
Kheynom: Hmm... I´ll have to look into that. You´re saying everyone except PB has the wrong torrent-file? How the hell could that have happened?
Seed Please

Can't download this torrent with BitTornado on linux, because one of the filenames contain the ~ character, which is a special character in linux.

These errors occurred during execution:
[16:42:37] got bad file info - path ~kr-from-below-v2.mp3 disallowed for security reasons
